info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 2:58PM CST until January 03 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTY... At 258 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Ashland to 6 miles northwest of Goldville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lineville, Ashland, Barfield, Cragford and Mellow Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
